Scripts.OnClick: if this:GetParent():GetParent():GetName()=="DPSMate_Details_CompareDamage" then if this:GetParent():GetName() == "DPSMate_Details_CompareDamage_player" then DPSMate.Modules.DetailsDamage:PlayerSpells_Update(this:GetID(), "_CompareDamage") DPSMate.Modules.DetailsDamage:SelectDetailsButton(1, "_CompareDamage") else DPSMate.Modules.DetailsDamage:SelectDetailsButton(this:GetID(), "_CompareDamage") end else if this:GetParent():GetName() == "DPSMate_Details_player" then DPSMate.Modules.DetailsDamage:PlayerSpells_Update(this:GetID(), "") DPSMate.Modules.DetailsDamage:SelectDetailsButton(1, "") else DPSMate.Modules.DetailsDamage:SelectDetailsButton(this:GetID(), "") end end

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(DPSMate.L["close"], nil, nil, nil, nil, 1) GameTooltip:Show()
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(DPSMate.L["switchdesc"], nil, nil, nil, nil, 1) GameTooltip:Show()
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(DPSMate.L["switchgraphsdesc"], nil, nil, nil, nil, 1) GameTooltip:Show()
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(DPSMate.L["switchindividualsdesc"], nil, nil, nil, nil, 1) GameTooltip:Show()

Scripts.OnMouseWheel: DPSMate_Details.LastScroll = "" if not this.oset then this.oset = 0 end this.oset = this.oset - arg1 FauxScrollFrame_OnVerticalScroll(24, DPSMate.Modules.DetailsDamage.Player_Update)
DPSMate_Details.LastScroll = "" if not this.oset then this.oset = 0 end this.oset = this.oset - arg1 FauxScrollFrame_OnVerticalScroll(24, DPSMate.Modules.DetailsDamage.PlayerSpells_Update)

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(DPSMate.L["close"], nil, nil, nil, nil, 1) GameTooltip:Show()

Scripts.OnMouseWheel: DPSMate_Details.LastScroll = "_CompareDamage" if not this.oset then this.oset = 0 end this.oset = this.oset - arg1 FauxScrollFrame_OnVerticalScroll(24, DPSMate.Modules.DetailsDamage.ScrollFrame_Update)
DPSMate_Details.LastScroll = "_CompareDamage" if not this.oset then this.oset = 0 end this.oset = this.oset - arg1 FauxScrollFrame_OnVerticalScroll(24, DPSMate.Modules.DetailsDamage.Player_Update)

DPSMate_Details.LastScroll = "_CompareDamage" if not this.oset then this.oset = 0 end this.oset = this.oset - arg1 FauxScrollFrame_OnVerticalScroll(24, DPSMate.Modules.DetailsDamage.PlayerSpells_Update)
